item.bioplethora.test_item.desc_0: This is just an experimental item. Mainly used for development only. Only accessible in creative mode.
item.bioplethora.crephoxl_hammer.desc_0: Debuffs targets on hit, deals more damage to targets with more than 49 maximum health.
item.bioplethora.crephoxl_hammer.desc_1: On right click on the ground - creates a shockwave and knocks up nearby targets. Cools down for 3 seconds.
item.bioplethora.crephoxl_hammer.desc_2: On hit while crouching - Hitting an entity while crouching will deal 80% of this tool's base damage to nearby entities within a 2-block radius. 1.5 second cooldown.
item.bioplethora.bellophite_arrow.desc_0: The Bellophgolem arrow deals more damage than the regular arrow.
item.bioplethora.bellophite_arrow.desc_1: On hit (block or entity), the arrow deals magic damages and debuffs all nearby mobs.
item.bioplethora.bellophgolem_shield.des: The Bellophgolem gets more durability than the regular shield.
While using, the Bellophgolem grants a high resistance level to the user while giving the user a regeneration effect.
A guide of a world with many creatures and monsters, varying from small, tiny creatures, to colossal, and giant, monsters. This is, Bioplethora.
